---
params:
  category: "Venues"
  cat_folder: "venue"
  cat_file: "../data/processed/db_tables/venue.csv"
  display_var: "venue"
  link_var: "venue_id"
title: "Category: `r params$category`"
output: 
  html_document:
    includes:
      before_body: "../site/navbar.html" 
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, error = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
df <- read_csv(params$cat_file)
```

```{r results='asis'}
if(nrow(df) > 0) {
  for(i in 1:nrow(df)) {
    cat(paste0("- [", df[[params$display_var]][i], "](/site/", params$cat_folder,"/", df[[params$link_var]][i], ".html)"), sep = "\n")  
  }
}

```
